Happy Place Holistics is Glasgow based holistic therapy business that works with clients to help manage stress and promote health, harmony and wellness.

We deliver effective, affordable and individually-tailored holistic treatments and advice.

Happy Place Holistics is an environmentally and ethically conscious business.

Claire is an extremely perceptive and talented therapist. The care and attention she provided for my employees was greatly appreciated and I received universally positive feedback. She has also provided therapeutic massage for myself and my family which we all found to be very beneficial. Claire's caring approach and positive energy complement her technical skills.

Kirk Strawn M.D. - Family Practitioner and President of PopHealthMan
